description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide three (3) Automated Defibrillators , with the option of purchasing an additional 5 units.
full_summary:
===============

Automated External Defibrillators Procurement Announcement
---------------------------------------------------------

**Tender Information:**
------------------------

* Tender Reference: WS4527537527
* Solicitation Number: WS4527537527-Doc4608154606
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-07-10T14:00:00 (EST)
* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: 2024-06-28

**Procurement Objectives:**
---------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified offerors to submit proposals for the procurement of Automated External Defibrillators.

**Goods to be Purchased:**
-------------------------

Three (3) Automated Defibrillators, with the option to purchase an additional five (5) units.

**Specific Procurement Requirements:**
--------------------------------------

* **Goods or Services:**
	+ Automated External Defibrillators
* **Delivery Location:**
	+ Department of Indigenous Services (ISC), various locations in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Open to all qualified offerors, with a preference for procurements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procedure for Submissions:**
-------------------------------

* Downloads are available from CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery; opening time delayed to 13:00 EST from 14:00 EST.
* All submissions must be in electronic format.
* All certificates and invoices must be submitted to complete the project at this time not enumerated hours expired.

**Point of Contact:**
---------------------

Fong, Tony (SPAC/PSPC)
Tony.Fong@tprojheuspac-pwgspgc.ca
(No phone number or fax number is provided.)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

**Notice and Documentation:**
-------------------------------

For information and documentation seeking detailed information, please visit https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19881510?extsite=MTk4ODE1MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
